outline:
1. to crush, be crushed, be contrite, be broken
    1. (Niphal)
      1. to be crushed
      2. to be contrite (fig.)
    2. (Piel) to crush
    3. (Pual)
      1. to be crushed, be shattered
      2. to be made contrite
    4. (Hithpael) to allow oneself to be crushed
kjv_def: beat to pieces, break (in pieces), bruise, contrite, crush, destroy, humble, oppress, smite.
strongs_def: to crumble; transitively, to bruise (literally or figuratively)
